Title: Relates to rent history and rent registration
Summary: Relates to rent history and rent registration; removes the statute of limitations on certain rent regulation violations.
LawCode: Amd §14, Pub Hous L; amd §§12 & 12-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §§26-516 & 26-517, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to penalties for owners of property who fail to file a proper or timely rent registration statement
